query.value: SELECT SYS_CNTRCT_NUM as PROJ_WBS_ID, BRAND_NM as BRAND_SHORT_NM, trim(ACCT_ID)    '-'    trim(BRAND_NM) as ACCT_BRAND_ID FROM CNMN.ACCOUNT_DEF
SELECT cast(PRFT_CNTR_CD as char(17)) as PRFT_CNTR_CD,BRAND_SHORT_NM FROM CNMN.PROFIT_CENTER

SELECT    WRK.ACCOUNT_ID as WBS_ID, concat(rtrim(concat(COALESCE(rtrim(AL2.OFFERING_CD),''),rtrim(BUS.BUSMEASUREDIV))),BUS.REVMAJOR)  as PRFT_CNTR_CD, WRK.ACCTGRP_ID as PROJ_WBS_ID, CFT_WORK_NUM, CASE  WHEN WRK.STATUS ='O' THEN 'A' ELSE WRK.STATUS END as SYS_STAT_CD, wrk.OWNING_COUNTRY_CD as cntry  FROM BMSIW.ACCOUNT_UV wrk INNER JOIN BMSIW.ACCOUNT_GROUP_UV CO     ON wrk.ACCTGRP_ID = CO.ACCTGRP_ID    AND wrk.CONTROL_GROUP_CD = CO.CONTROL_GROUP_CD INNER JOIN BMSIW.T510BUS_UV BUS     ON BUS.COUNTRY        = WRK.OWNING_COUNTRY_CD                  AND BUS.COMPANYCODE    = WRK.OWNING_COMPANY_CD              AND BUS.BUSINESSTYPE   = WRK.BUS_TYP_CD  LEFT join BMSIW.T510CON_UV co1     on co.ACCTGRP_ID = co1.contractnumber     and wrk.OWNING_COUNTRY_CD = co1.COUNTRY     and co.OWNING_COMPANY_CD = co1.COMPANYCODE  LEFT OUTER JOIN BMSIW.OFFER_COMP_REF_UV AL2 ON WRK.OFFERING_COMP_CD=AL2.OFFERING_COMP_CD  AND WRK.OWNING_COUNTRY_CD=AL2.COUNTRY_CD  AND WRK.OWNING_COMPANY_CD=AL2.COMPANY_CD   WHERE (co1.contractnumber IS NOT NULL OR co1.contractnumber<>'')  AND ( substr(char(CO1.CONTRENDDATE),1,7) >= substr(char(current date  - 3 YEARS),1,7)   OR    CO1.CONTRACTSTATUS IN ( 'A', 'P' ) ) and wrk.CONTROL_GROUP_CD  in ('AP1','AUS1','BRZ1','CAN1','CAN2', 'EMEA','EMEA1', 'NA1', 'NA2')          and wrk.ACCT_TYP_CD ='C' and wrk.INSTALLATION_ID = 'PACT' and wrk.CFT_WORK_NUM<>'' and wrk.ACCOUNT_ID NOT IN (select wkk.worknumber from bmsiw.t510wrk_uv wkk fetch first 10000000 rows only)               AND    (wrk.OWNING_COUNTRY_CD    in      (SELECT cast(AL1.CTRY_CD as char(4)) FROM BMSIW.GEO_RGN_CTRY_UV AL1 JOIN BMSIW.COUNTRY_REF_UV AL2          ON AL1.CTRY_CD=AL2.COUNTRY_CD         AND AL1.RGN_LVL1_CD @{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_RGN_LVL1_CD}         AND AL1.CTRY_CD not @{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_COUNTRIES_BH}         AND AL1.CTRY_CD not @{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_COUNTRIES_MIGR}         AND AL2.STATUS='O' and AL1.CTRY_CD!='606' WHERE '@{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_INST}'<>'CDT - '  '@{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_GEO_NAME}' OR (AL1.CTRY_CD @{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_COUNTRIES} and '@{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_INST}'='CDT - '  '@{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_GEO_NAME}') fetch first 250 rows only) or (wrk.OWNING_COUNTRY_CD='606')) and  @{pipeline().parameters.p_IPPF_RULES_INSTANCE}<>'JP' with ur
